file_content.text: Warning: Coolant regulation system ignited. Catastrophic structural integrity failure has begun. Destruction of the Javelin is imminent.
Please evacuate immediately. Repeat, please evacuate immediately.
Jedi, do you read? We're clearing the tactical stations, and everything's flashing red. What's the situation?
Hallow Voice, report. Did any of our ships get caught in that explosion?
I have to check the fleet.
All is well. There was light, but not a brightness to blind or burn.
Watch that conduit! This area's getting too dangerous, we're pulling out to the ship.
You and the commandos have to get to the ship immediately.
Evacuate, now.
All right, you heard her. Go!
All right, you heard him. Go!
Those bombs have done too much damage. We've lost the Javelin.
The ship's coming apart.
Copy. Listen up! Drop your gear and run for the ship!
No, wait. Kalas-Na, take point, I can't leave yet.
The Imperial crewmen were trying to erase these tactical stations. They might be carrying battle plans--I need to do a full download.
Felix, in a few minutes the Javelin is going to be drifting debris.
You don't have time.
Sorry, I can't turn my back on vital intelligence.
If you do this, will you be able to evacuate?
Can you get to the ship?
Uh... unlikely. Sounds like the whole deck's going to shear off.
Get everything you can find, I'm not leaving empty-handed.
Good idea.
Blast. This'll take longer than I thought. I won't be able to join you.
The pods. I saw a rank of escape pods on this deck; I can make it down to Corellia's surface.
Then do it. Stay hidden, we'll come for you.
A sensible plan.
Copy. Now take care of yourself.
Something could go wrong. I don't want to lose you.
Please don't do this.
I'll be alright, I promise. There's too much we haven't said yet.
Even if you survive the landing, you'll be in the middle of a war zone.
You'll be down there alone.
I'll stay bunkered down. This data's more important than heroics.
You can't be serious.
There's no time. I've got a way out, you need to go.
Be safe, and we'll rendezvous on Corellia. Iresso, signing off.
Jedi? Are you there? Something exploded near the tactical stations, but we don't know what's happening.
Hallow Voice, was the fleet caught in that explosion?
I need to check the fleet.
All is well. There was light, but not a brightness to blind or burn.
Uh! Everything's shaking, we're getting back to the ship!
It doesn't matter, tell everyone to run for the hangar bay.
Get off the dreadnought now.
Okay, everybody, back the way we came!
We couldn't stop the Javelin from being destroyed. There isn't much time.
The ship's breaking up.
I'm so sorry, Jedi. All right, we'll try and get to safety.
But... no, I can't. Go without me. Jedi, I have to stay just for a few minutes.
The crew was trying to destroy these tactical stations. I think they were hiding something. I'm going to download everything I can.
There is a time and a place for gaining knowledge, Nadia!
Forget it and get to safety.
I know, I know! But what if there's battle plans in here?
Will you be able to reach the ship in time?
Can you still escape?
I--I don't think so. This deck doesn't feel safe.
Any intelligence about the Empire's plans could help Corellia.
A wise move.
This is... there's too much data, it's going to take too long.
Wait! We passed a row of escape pods. I can pilot one out--or point it at Corellia's surface or something.
Keep hidden when you land, and we'll come for you.
Do it, but be careful.
I'll be fine. But you won't unless you hurry.
I'm not going to leave you behind, Nadia. I couldn't.
I can't leave you.
You have to. But we'll be together again soon. I feel it.
I have a duty to keep you safe.
I must protect my Padawan.
You have a whole galaxy to keep safe. I'll make you proud... Master.
You want to land blind in a war zone, alone, carrying critical intelligence?
That's a stupid plan.
If we stand and argue, we'll both die here.
Please, the hangar won't be safe for long. Go on--I'll see you on Corellia!
